title: Jane Seton: or, the Kings Advocate. A Scottish historical romance
author: Grant, James
snippet: One half was darklyrounded into shadow, on the other shone the brightsplendour of the meridian sun, which lit up ad thewindings of the various little pastoral glens, throughwhich the Peniel, the Glespin, the Kinnox, and othermountain tributaries, flowed to feed the Douglas at itsbase.
